name: Sudipto Chandra
intro: Software Engineer, experienced in web & desktop app development.
about: I love to do creative work that can challenge my abilities to its max.
Professionally, I am a full-stack web developer. As a hobby, I've built several desktop apps. In future, I plan to work on Android/iPhone platform. I also have a great interest in game development.

Time is limited for all humans. Keeping that in mind, I am always trying to savour the taste of things that I like and care about. My greater goal in life is to leave behind a footprint that will shine upon the future generations.
